short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find targeted leads automatically and send them a friend request with message.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FriendBEAST automates and accelerates the process of getting and connecting with targeted, key-word based Friends on Facebook.
Improve and automate your friends list with a single click.

If there's not enough time to send friend requests manually, this is the right tool to use. Add keywords, and click a button, done! All completed automatically.

It also will get engaging conversations started automatically.
